amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for Fossil Fuel Research and Development programs by $133,400,000, and to increase funds for ARPA-E by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the fossil energy research and development account by $133,400,000, and increase funds for the advanced research project agency account by $133,400,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hirono amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 257 (Roll no. 316).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hirono amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 257 (Roll no. 316).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Ms. Hirono.
